LanguageData.MessageColonistInFinalStagesOfLabor: {PAWN_labelShort}'s labor has begun the final stages.
LanguageData.MessageMechChargerDestroyedMechGoesBerse: A mech charger was destroyed while {PAWN_nameDef} was charging! The power disruption has scrambled its brain, and it is going berserk.
LanguageData.MessageCantUseOnResistingPerson: Cannot use {ABILITY_label} on anyone who would actively resist.
LanguageData.MessagePawnHasNoXenogenes: {0_labelShort} has no available xenogenes to implant.
LanguageData.MessageCanOnlyTargetColonistsPrisonersAn: Xenogerms can only be implanted into colonists, prisoners, and slaves.
LanguageData.MessageCannotImplantInTempFactionMembers: Cannot implant in temporary faction members.
LanguageData.MessageXenogermCancelledMissingPack: Work on the xenogerm at {0_labelShort} was cancelled: Missing required genepack.
LanguageData.MessageCannotUseOnOtherFactions: {ABILITY_label} can only be used on colonists, prisoners, and slaves.
LanguageData.MessageCannotBecomeNonPreferredXenotype: {0_labelShort} refuses to become a disliked xenotype.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanAddingEscortingMech: Auto-adding {MECH_nameDef} to the caravan, since it is escorting {OVERSEER_nameDef}
LanguageData.MessageCaravanRemovingEscortingMech: Auto-removing {MECH_nameDef} from the caravan, since it is escorting {OVERSEER_nameDef}
LanguageData.MessageMechanitorCasketOpened: {0} was a mechanitor. You can remove {0_possessive} {1_label} and use it on a colonist.
LanguageData.MessageNoBloodfeedersPrisonerInteraction: Some prisoners' interaction mode required a bloodfeeder. Since the last bloodfeeder is gone, their interaction modes have reset to "No interaction".
LanguageData.MessagePlantDiedOfNoPollution: {0} has died because of a lack of pollution.
LanguageData.MessageCocoonDisturbed: A cocoon has been disturbed and is opening!
LanguageData.MessageCocoonDisturbedPlural: Cocoons have been disturbed and are opening!
LanguageData.MessageTargetMustBeDownedToForceReimplan: {PAWN_nameDef} must be downed before you can force {PAWN_objective} to reimplant {PAWN_possessive} xenogerm.
LanguageData.MessageWorkTypeDisabledAge: {0_nameDef} is only {1} years old. {2} work can only be done from age {3}.
LanguageData.MessageDeathrestingPawnCanWakeSafely: {PAWN_nameDef} can now wake from deathrest safely.
LanguageData.MessageMechanitorLostControlOfMech: {0_nameDef} has lost control of a {1_kindBase} mech
LanguageData.MetabolismTooLowToCreateXenogerm: The total metabolism of the selected genes must be {MIN} or higher to continue, but currently it is only {AMOUNT}.
LanguageData.ComplexityTooHighToCreateXenogerm: The total complexity of the selected genes must be {MAX} or less to create a xenogerm, but currently it is {AMOUNT}.
LanguageData.MessageNoSelectedGenepacks: Cannot create a xenogerm with no genes.
LanguageData.MessageNoSelectedGenes: Cannot create a xenotype with no genes.
LanguageData.MessageDeathrestCapacityChanged: {PAWN_nameDef}'s deathrest capacity has increased from {OLD} to {NEW}.
LanguageData.SanguophagesArrivingSoon: The sanguophages will arrive in a few hours for their meeting.
LanguageData.SanguophagesBegunMeeting: The sanguophages have begun their meeting.
LanguageData.SanguophagesLeavingTemperature: The sanguophages are leaving due to life-threatening temperature.
LanguageData.MessagePawnWokenFromSunlight: {PAWN_nameDef} was woken from {PAWN_possessive} deathrest due to sunlight exposure.
LanguageData.MessageBedExposedToSunlight: The {BED_labelShort} {PAWN_nameDef} is assigned to use for deathrest has been exposed to sunlight. {PAWN_nameDef} cannot deathrest there.
LanguageData.GeneExtractorNoPowerEjectedMessage: {PAWN_labelShort} was ejected from a gene extractor due to lack of power.
LanguageData.MessagePawnKilledRipscanner: {PAWN_nameDef}'s brain has been destroyed by the subcore ripscanner.
LanguageData.MessageChildcareNotAssigned: {FEEDER_labelShort} is not assigned to do childcare tasks.
LanguageData.MessageTooManyCustomXenotypes: You already have the maximum number of custom xenotypes. You must delete some if you wish to create more.
LanguageData.MessageConflictingGenesPresent: Cannot save xenotype with multiple conflicting genes.
LanguageData.MessageDeathrestBuildingBound: {BUILDING_labelShort} has been bound to {PAWN_nameDef} ({CUR}/{MAX} deathrest capacity).
LanguageData.MessageDevelopmentalStageSelectionDisabl: Developmental stage selection disabled by scenario.
LanguageData.MessagePawnHadNotEnoughBloodToProduceHem: {PAWN_nameDef} did not have enough blood to produce a hemogen pack.
LanguageData.MessageCannotStartHemogenExtraction: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have enough blood to produce a hemogen pack.
LanguageData.MessageCannotPostponeGrowthMoment: You must choose how {PAWN_nameDef} will grow now.
LanguageData.MessageDraftedPawnCarryingBaby: Warning: {0_labelShort} is carrying a baby while drafted.
LanguageData.MessageTakingBabyToSafeTemperature: {ADULT_nameDef} is moving {BABY_nameDef} somewhere with a safer temperature.
